parameters.name: FeatureName
parameters.description: Name of a feature in Component

parameters.name: WhichPane
parameters.description: FeatureManager design tree pane in which to expand Component as defined in swFeatMgrPane_e

title: IFeatureManager.ExpandFeature
description: Expands the specified component in the specified FeatureManager design tree pane.
signature:
System.Boolean ExpandFeature( 
   System.Object
Component
,
   System.String
FeatureName
,
   System.Int32
WhichPane
)

parameters.name: FeatureName
parameters.description: Name of a feature in Component

parameters.name: WhichPane
parameters.description: FeatureManager design tree pane in which to expand Component as defined in swFeatMgrPane_e

returns: True if the specified component is expanded in the specified FeatureManager design tree pane, false if not
